scripts.build:ace: cd ../accessibility-checker-engine && npm install && npm run build:all && cd ../rule-server
scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && npm run build:ace && shx mkdir -p src/routes && shx mkdir -p api && shx mkdir -p api/dist && tsoa routes && tsc -p ./src && gulp --gulpfile gulp/gulpfile.js build
scripts.start: npm run build && cd dist && node main.js
scripts.debug: npm run build && TS_NODE_PROJECT=./src/tsconfig.json node --nolazy --inspect-brk=9229 -r ts-node/register ./src/main.ts
